summary: Completed comprehensive testing of VeriTrust AI brand identity website. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend mostly functional with excellent UI/UX, but has critical clipboard permission error blocking color copy functionality and AI image generation timeout issues.

critical_bugs.issue: Clipboard write permission denied when clicking color swatches to copy hex values
critical_bugs.error: NotAllowedError: Failed to execute 'writeText' on 'Clipboard': Write permission denied
critical_bugs.impact: Users cannot copy brand colors, blocking key brand kit functionality
critical_bugs.root_cause: Clipboard API requires secure context (HTTPS) and proper permissions

integration_issues.issue: AI image generation times out after 70 seconds, no image appears
integration_issues.impact: Core AI workflow feature not working for users

ui_bugs.issue: Error overlay blocking UI interactions due to clipboard errors
ui_bugs.impact: Prevents users from interacting with certain UI elements

passed_tests: Hero section loads with correct headline 'Stop Fraud Before It Happens'
Navigation between all sections works (smooth scrolling)
Brand Identity section tabs (Logos, Colors, Typography, Iconography) functional
Features section bento grid layout (6 feature cards, 4 capability cards)
Dashboard mockups section with analytics (4 stat cards)
Downloads section with all download buttons functional (colors, typography, guidelines, logos)
Dark theme implementation with correct VeriTrust AI branding

critical_fixes: Fix clipboard API permissions for color copying functionality - implement fallback or proper HTTPS context
Debug AI image generation timeout - check emergentintegrations library integration and API key
Remove or handle webpack dev server error overlay in production build
recommendations: Implement clipboard fallback (show modal with hex value for manual copy)
Add loading states and error handling for AI generation
Test AI generation with different prompts and shorter timeouts
Ensure production build doesn't show dev server overlays
